titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 8-inch bench grinders for grinding, polishing or otherwise finishing metal or cement, valued under $3,025 each.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 8-inch bench grinders for grinding, polishing or otherwise finishing metal or cement, valued under $3,025 each.
